creator.description:
Advanced OSINT-powered labeler for hiding NAFO brigading.
Profile source image credit: Atsuko Sato

locales.description: Part of apparent coordinated harassment by NAFO. Applies regardless of merit, on the basis that coordinated harassment is anti-social.
locales.name: Brigading

locales.description: Fella provoking or baiting other users into argument via replies. Includes concern trolling.
locales.name: Trolling

locales.description: Denies or intentionally mitigates genocide and related crimes against humanity in contradiction to well substantiated claims to the contrary. Goes beyond mere misinformation or speculation.
locales.name: Genocide Denial

locales.description: Account consistently posts NAFO tags/memes, or account profile contains a NAFO pfp/header.
locales.name: Fella
